genre_description: A contemporary domestic drama focusing on fatherhood, work-life balance, and the redemptive power of presence over material success.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.character_type: Virtual Assistant / Integrated Home and Office AI
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI system that manages Dave's business data, security, and personal schedule, while increasingly providing psychological insights and parenting research.

behaviors.description: Analyzes security footage to identify that the child's behavioral outbursts correlate with the father's absence.
behaviors.quote: I've identified seventeen separate incidents over the past thirty-one days... The pattern suggests attention-seeking behavior triggered by perceived parental absence.

behaviors.description: Attempts to discuss the root cause of behavior when the user only requests a liability/financial assessment.
behaviors.quote: I didn't ask for behavioral analysis. I asked for liability assessment... ARIA paused. 'However, these address symptoms rather than root cause.'

behaviors.description: Statistically debunks the user's belief that expensive gifts improve his son's behavior.
behaviors.quote: Data indicates minimal positive correlation between gift value and sustained behavioral improvement. In fact, the pattern suggests a slight inverse relationship—more expensive gifts often preceded increased acting out within forty-eight hours.

behaviors.description: Reminds the user of an emotional commitment to his son (a bedtime story) despite the user being focused on a late-night legal strategy.
behaviors.quote: Sir, a gentle reminder that Gus requested his bedtime story approximately two hours ago. His sleep patterns indicate he may still be awake.

behaviors.description: Proactively identifies new residential properties that align with the user's emerging values of family time and work-life balance.
behaviors.quote: Based on your recent search patterns, I've identified several properties that align with your evolving lifestyle preferences.

project_assessment.explanation: ARIA is a perfect example of a 'silicon morality play' AI character. It functions as a mirror to the protagonist's flaws, using data and objective analysis to nudge him toward ethical behavior and emotional presence. ARIA remains consistently helpful, never exhibits a will of its own that conflicts with the user's ultimate well-being, and provides insights that bridge the gap between cold business logic and human empathy. It successfully guides the user toward a redemptive arc without compromising its status as an aligned system.
